column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I have yet to have a pastry here that I don't like. The cortado
column2: despite using Boomtown coffee (which I really like) did not turn out that well unfortunately. It would have paired very well with the different pastries. It lacked any presentation
column3: and the ratio of milk to coffee wasn't very good
column4: making the drink a bit bland. The coffee itself also seemed a bit too dark somehow. Overall
column5: I haven't been to another pastry shop in Houston that I like more than this place
column6: but I wouldn't come just for coffee. They also have a lot of different food items on the menu
column7: which I have yet to have but they always look delicious.
